site.title: Fernando Bouchet | Full Stack Developer transitioning to Cybersecurity
site.description: I'm Fernando Bouchet, a Programming Technician and Computer Science student. I build web applications using technologies like React, Node.js, and databases. I'm currently training in cybersecurity. This portfolio showcases my projects, skills, and education.

about.p4: My background in building web applications gives me a unique perspective on how to secure them.
about.p6: , I am currently focused on mastering Cybersecurity fundamentals, Python automation, and Linux systems.
about.p7: I aim to create software that is not only functional but also resilient.

projects.p1: Explore this selection of projects I've worked on to see my skills in action.
